title: When people tilt your team...
body:
And they ruin your perfect game by intentionally feeding the enemy jungle for 10 minutes....

Our ADC Jhin was 3/2/7
I was Supp Thresh 5/0/3
Mid yasou 1/9/0
Jungle lee 6/2/5
Top Nasus 0/9/3

Just because they lost lane, Nasus and Yasuo (same clan tag) decide its fair to just run straight into mid turret for 10 minutes straight, Jhin gets tilted and joins them.

Why are players so childish over getting outplayed in lane?

The enemy Jungler (Graves) goes ahead and gives them all **HONORS** for feeding?

This community is absolute trash, if you are caught Honoring players that intentionally feed you should be banned along with them. we do **NOT** need that rubbish attitude in this game.

OCE Needs to follow the same standard as Chinese League servers, Your account is tied to your **PERSONAL DETAILS**. If you are banned, you are **BANNED** for **LIFE**.

**/rant**

replies.body: Yeah when you can make another account in under a minute and continue playing you wonder why the community hasn't gotten any better in the last 5 years

News flash!

Riot hasn't cared about oce server since released lol!

Happy for a Mod to prove me wrong with 1 THING they implemented which came from a community suggested idea FROM OCE! 

JUST 1 

Don't bother, you won't find it lol!
